casebody.data:
No. 701, No. 713,

October Term, 1955.

October Term, 1955.

Reid, Superintendent, District of Columbia Jail, v. Covert, Kinsella, Warden, v. Krueger,

351 U. S. 487; and

351 U. S. 470. The Solicitor General is requested to file a response to the petition for rehearing in these cases within 15 days.
